title: ARIAT Women's R.e.a.l. Perfect Rise Leila Boot Cut Jean
description: MADE FOR COMFORT: These denim jeans are rider tested and thoughtfully engineered; The slim fitting style through the thigh and performance stretch denim for added comfort that holds its shape and flatters yours

SUBTLE AND PRACTICAL FASHION: Available in a variety of washes, these jeans have a fashion back pocket that adds classic western appeal and has a wide leg to fit over your boots and shoes; The pockets add practicality, helping you keep your belongings safe while you go about your day

PERFORMANCE FABRIC: These ladies jeans are made a performance-oriented blend of cotton, polyester and spandex for optimum durability and flexibility; You can machine wash them in cold water to maintain the fabric’s strength
PREMIUM FIT: These boot cut jeans were designed and created with a denim that promises to never sag or gap, keeping that perfect, figure hugging fit, all day long

SCIENCE OF INNOVATION: Ariat excels in advanced technologies to deliver products that outperform in various conditions; Partnering with world-class biomechanical research groups and testing labs, Ariat strives to improve performance, comfort, and durability;

Featuring a combination of comfort and style, the R.E.A.L. Jeans for women will be a great addition to your wardrobe. Made of a performance blend of cotton, polyester and spandex, these stretchable women’s jeans allow a great range of movement while holding their shape and flattering yours. These jeans add a modern twist to the classic country fashion.
